m_descr: Опрашивать состояние устройств через опредленное время.
h_pollBatteries: Be careful! Depending on the configured interval regularly polling of battery powered devices could reduce there battery lifetime a lot. Be also clear about that some devices with multiple sensors will be woken up multiple times a poll time is triggered - e.g. battery powered device with 4 Sensors will wake up (default is 20s) four times, so this device will about 80s awake during poll time is triggered.
l_batteryDevs: Do not poll this battery powered Sensors:
